item.description:
Another fun day at the beach with the dogs.

Tide schedule is ideal for us this weekend - Low tide is at 3:02 pm so we will have plenty of room to play and run around on the beach.

Sunset is around 4 pm....so this should give us the perfect time slot to run around the beach with the dogs and enjoy lots of smooth, flat sand for romping, frisbee, ball chucker, etc.

Carpooling from Hannaford Parking Lot on Manchester/Hooksett town line (DW Highway) is at 1:15 pm

After playing on the beach, if anyone wants to stop and get a bite to eat, we can do that.





Don't forget to bring your frisbees, chuck-a-balls, drinking water and pooper bags.

And dress in layers. It will be chilly there, but you may warm up with all the running around with the dogs.

See you soon,
Plunk and Judi



As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release, hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, and/or death, including those caused by negligence and or other reasons. You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Plunk will be the cute beagle screaming "Over Here.....over here.......over here !!! "

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: York Maine - Long Sands Beach at Low Tide
